altTitles.en: Before Dawn and the End of the World
La fine del mondo e prima dell'alba
世界の終わりと夜明け前

description.en:
The first collection of independent short stories from Inio Asano.  
  
**A compilation of oneshots that include:**  
1. Yoakemae (Before Dawn)  
2. Alfalfa  
3-5. Nichiyou, Gogo, 6-jihan. (Sunday, Afternoon, 6:30.)  
6. Chou Mousou A-ko no Nichijou to Yuuutsu (The Typical Day and Melancholy of Super-Imaginative A-ko)  
7. Kyuujitsu no Sugoshikata (How to Spend a Day Off)  
8. 17  
9. Subarashii Sekai (What a Wonderful World)  
10. Tokyo  
11. Sekai no Owari (The End of the World)

biography.en:
Associated Names:
• Асано Инио
• 浅野一二〇

Name (in native language):
• 浅野いにお

Birth Date:
• September 22, 1980

Birth Place:
• Ibaraki, Japan

Previously worked as Takahashi Shin’s assistant on Saishuu Heiki Kanojo.

Asano created the acclaimed manga Solanin, which was released as a feature film in Japan in April 2010, starring Aoi Miyazaki. Known for creating character-driven, realist stories, ranging from slice of life to psychological horror, Asano won first prize in the 2001 GX competition for young manga artists. Yomiuri Shimbun described Asano as "one of the voices of his generation."

Satou Satsuki and Atsumori Ran were his assistants.

Married to Torikai Akane
